mapper.select: select id,article_id, tag_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified from tag_article where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tag_article( id,article_id, tag_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{id},#{username},#{password},#{birthDate},#{nickname},#{email},#{github},#{qq},#{wecaht},#{avatar},sysdate,sysdate,#{hobby},#{motto},#{md_info})
mapper.update: update tag_article set title=#{title}, introduction=#{introduction}, md_material=#{mdMaterial}, html_material=#{htmlMaterial}, gmt_modified=sysdate where id = #{id}
